sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"事故，事件"之意。
means: accident ：强调偶然或意外发生的不幸事情。
incident ：既可指小事件或附带事件，又可指政治上具有影响的事件或事变。
event ：可指任何大小事件，但尤指历史上的重大事件。
occurrence和happening这两个词多指日常生活中发生的一般事件，有时也指偶然发生的事。

sentence.Network_en: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
sentence.Network_cn: 65岁以上者是冠心病的最高发人群。

sentence.Network_en: For months at a time, air raids were a nightly occurrence.
sentence.Network_cn: 一度有几个月，每天晚上都会发生空袭。

sentence.Network_en: The occurrence of the disease is apparently related to standards of hygiene.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种病的发生率显然与卫生状况相关.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... excellence 杰出，优秀 occurrence 发生，出现 convergence 会聚，集中.
英语单词立体记忆 ... → ampere 安培 → occurrence 发生，出现，事件 → excursion 短期的旅行.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... occur n 发生，出现 occurrence v 出现，产生 recur a 再发生，重现.
发生情形 (Occurrence ) 只要有病媒蚊存在， 病毒一经传入， 任何地方都有可能发生流行， 尤其在登革热的处女地， 将会遭受爆发 …

list.abs: mineral matter 矿物质mineral occurrence 矿点mineral oil 矿物油
radioactive nuclide 放射性核素radioactive occurrence 放射性矿床radioactive pollutant 放射性污染物
石油词汇英语翻译(AB) ... abnormal magnetic variation 异常磁变 abnormal occurrence 异常现象 abnormal polarization 异常偏振.
新GRE数学考试概率(Probability)是指某一事件在相同的条件下可能发生也可能不发生，这类事件成为随机事件(random occurrence)。

means.word_mean: 发生,事件,机会,事故,惊险活动

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: probably from the plural of archaic occurrent, in the same sense, via French from Latin occurrent- 'befalling', from the verb occurrere (see occur)

entry.def: An occurrence is something that happens.

example.ex: Complaints seemed to be an everyday occurrence...
The food queues have become a daily occurrence across the country.
example.tran: 排队购买食品的长龙已成了全国各地每日可见的景象。

entry.def: The occurrence of something is the fact that it happens or is present.

example.ex: The greatest occurrence of coronary heart disease is in those over 65.
example.tran: 65岁以上者是冠心病的最高发人群。

sentences.sentence: "the occurrence (or presence) of life on other planets"

auth_sentence.content: Wasn't there a similar occurrence some time ago?
auth_sentence.res_content: Wasn't there a similar occurrence some time ago?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wasn't there a similar occurrence some time ago?

auth_sentence.content: Naturally, I am extremely happy for this occurrence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Naturally, I am extremely happy for this occurrence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Naturally, I am extremely happy for this occurrence.

auth_sentence.content: So then we save our protest for future occurrence.
auth_sentence.res_content: So then we save our protest for future occurrence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So then we save our protest for future occurrence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正在发生的, 偶然发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: occurrence[[n.发生,出现,事件,发生的事情]]男→adj.正在发生的, 偶然发生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一再发生的;复发的,反复出现的
stems_affixes.word_buile: recur[v.[尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现]+ent……的→recurrent一再发生的
concur[v.意见相同,一致,互助]+ent……的→concurrent同时发生的
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ency表名词→流通货币[跑来跑去的钱]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+iculum表名词→学生跑来跑去的[依据]→课程表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现,事件,发生的事情
stems_affixes.word_buile: occur[v.发生,出现;存在;想起,想到]+ence表名词→occurrence发生,出现

sentences.en: The occurrence of storms delayed our trip.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨延误了我们的旅行。

sentences.en: Newspapers record the chief occurrences of the day.
sentences.cn: 报纸报道了当天发生的大事。

jushi.english: The occurrence of storms delayed our trip.
jushi.chinese: 暴风雨延误了我们的旅行。

jushi.english: We meet with an incredible occurrence.
jushi.chinese: 我们碰到一件不可思议的事。

jushi.english: Newspapers record the chief occurrences of the day.
jushi.chinese: 报纸报道了当天发生的大事。
